title: Tom Wilhelmsen Opera and Ballet Prize
text: The Tom Wilhelmsen Opera and Ballet Prize () is the main <a href="opera">opera</a> and <a href="ballet">ballet</a> prize of <a href="Norway">Norway</a>, awarded by the philanthropic Tom Wilhelmsen's Foundation ("Tom Wilhelmsens Stiftelse") in honour of shipping magnate <a href="Tom%20Wilhelmsen%20%28shipping%20magnate%29">Tom Wilhelmsen</a> (1911-1978) through a donation from the billionaire Wilhelmsen family, owners of Norway's largest shipping company <a href="Wilh.%20Wilhelmsen">Wilh. Wilhelmsen</a>. It includes an annual monetary prize of over 50,000 euro.
